title: WTB: T206 Mathewson Dark Cap, PSA 4, 5 or maybe 6
author: Ericc22

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Mathewson Dark Cap, PSA 4, 5 or maybe 6
posts.post_content:
Greetings,

I am on the prowl for a Mathewson Dark Cap that is in the PSA 4-6 range. If you have one you are looking to sell, please send me a PM. I am looking to buy based on VCP, + or - depending on condition.

I welcome all inquiries. I figured I'd check here before heading to ebay.

Thanks!

Eric

I have a PSA graded Mathewson . The card is either a 5 or a 6. The card is in my lock box and hasn't seen the light of day for the last two yrs. If you are still looking my is for sale. Tell me what your offering for a 5 or 6 and if it works Iwill go and get the card and send you a scan.

Joseph,

I sent you a PM. Looking forward to hearing back!

Eric
